name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou: Kamikashimashi-hen
summary: The club has successfully made it to Okinomiya and evades more crazed villagers as they try to find the Sonozaki family's stronghold, meeting a girl named Une who may hold the key to salvation. Meanwhile, Rika and Hanyuu stay behind in Hinamizawa and do some investigating of their own, encountering some old acquaintances.
